Parameters: Red blood cells (RBC), white blood cells (WBC), hemoglobin (Hgb), hematocrit (Hct), platelets (Plt), mean corpuscular volume (MCV), mean corpuscular hemoglobin (MCH), mean corpuscular hemoglobin concentration (MCHC), red cell distribution width (RDW), white blood cell differential (neutrophils, lymphocytes, monocytes, eosinophils, basophils)
Sodium (Na), potassium (K), chloride (Cl), bicarbonate (HCO3), blood urea nitrogen (BUN), creatinine (Cr), glucose (Glu), calcium (Ca)
Conditions and restrictions: Fasting for 8 to 12 hours before the test

Parameters: BMP plus albumin (Alb), total protein (TP), alkaline phosphatase (ALP), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), bilirubin (Bil)
Conditions and restrictions: Fasting for 8 to 12 hours before the test

Parameters: Total cholesterol (TC), high-density lipoprotein cholesterol (HDL-C), low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL-C), triglycerides (TG)
Conditions and restrictions: Fasting for 9 to 12 hours before the test

Parameters: Thyroid-stimulating hormone (TSH), free thyroxine (FT4), free triiodothyronine (FT3), thyroid peroxidase antibodies (TPOAb), thyroglobulin antibodies (TgAb)
ALP, ALT, AST, Bil, Alb, TP, prothrombin time (PT), international normalized ratio (INR)
BUN, Cr, Glu, electrolytes, urine analysis (UA), urine protein, urine creatinine clearance (CrCl)
PT, INR, activated partial thromboplastin time (APTT), fibrinogen, D-dimer, platelet count, bleeding time
pH, partial pressure of oxygen (PaO2), partial pressure of carbon dioxide (PaCO2), oxygen saturation (SaO2), bicarbonate (HCO3), base excess (BE)
Fasting blood glucose (FBG), oral glucose tolerance test (OGTT), glycosylated hemoglobin (HbA1c)
Conditions and restrictions: Fasting for 8 to 12 hours before FBG and OGTT, no special preparation required for HbA1c
